title: Baker or Darnold in Carolina? NFL breakout duo; Devin McCourty
itunes:title: Baker or Darnold in Carolina? NFL breakout duo; Devin McCourty
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast dives into the quarterback competition between Baker Mayfield and Sam Darnold in Carolina. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty explain who’s most likely to get the starting quarterback job and why the future is at stake for Baker and Darnold. Next, they’re joined by Jason’s twin brother, Devin McCourty and he talks about how to get under Jason’s skin and which of them would pay the bill. Later, the GMFB crew shares which duo in the NFL is due for a breakout season - find out which defensive duos Jason and Peter picked to breakout, and then they dive into a new segment where the crew needs to defend a take using 10 random words.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
